vocabInfos.mediumDef:
A man of the tribe of Simeon living at the time of Egypt and Wilderness, first mentioned at Gen.46.10;
son of: Simeon (H8095);
brother of: Jamin (H3226), Ohad (H0161), Jachin (H3199), Zerah (H2226L) and Shaul (H7586H); also called Nemuel at Num.26.12; 1x
Group of ye.mu.el (יְמוּאֵל "Jemuel" H3223)
§ Nemuelites = see Nemuel "day of God"
a descendant of Nemuel
vocabInfos._es_Definition: descendiente de Jemuel, Nemuel, hijo de Simeón
vocabInfos._zh_tw_Definition:
尼母利族 这个形容詞在希伯來文的意思是 見 尼母利 "上帝的日子"
尼母利的後裔(民 26:12)
vocabInfos._zh_Definition:
尼母利族 这个形容词在希伯来文的意思是 见 尼母利 "上帝的日子"
尼母利的后裔(民 26:12)
